channel.title: Stream on Marad Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Stream on Marad Blog

item.title: Custom Collectors in Java 8
item.description: Java 8 sure did bring a few interesting features. One of them are definitely the streams. Internet is full of the instructions on how to create and use them. Today I’d like to talk about something a little bit different - collectors. What is a collector? Streams can be used to process collections. The way it works is that we first define all transformations on the collection with non-terminal operations like map, flatMap, filter, etc.
